title: Culture: Landmarks (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Landmarks subcategory within Culture. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: Mt. Fuji is a very tall mountain.
cards.romaji: Fuji-san wa totemo takai yama desu.
cards.japanese: 富士山はとても高い山です。

cards.english: The original Golden Pavilion was burned down in an arson attack in 1950 and was re-constructed in 1955 as a replica of the original.
cards.romaji: Kinkaku wa sen ky hyaku goj nen ni h.ka ni yori sh.shitushi, sen ky hyaku goj gonen ni saiken saremashita.
cards.japanese: 金閣は千九百五十年に放火により焼失し、千九百五十五年に再建されました。

cards.english: Every year, thousands of people from all over the world visit Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park.
cards.romaji: Maitoshi, sekaij kara takusan no gaikokujin ga Hiroshima heiwa kinen k.en o otozuremasu.
cards.japanese: 毎年、世界中からたくさんの外国人が広島平和記念公園を訪れます。

cards.english: The site of the Todai temple complex has an area larger than 340,000 square meters.
cards.romaji: T.daiji no shikichi wa, sanj yonman heih. m.toru ij. no hirosa ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 東大寺の敷地は、三十四万平方メートル以上の広さがあります。
